thread.title: Devastated Kylie Minogue to return engagement ring in effort to 'move on' after shock split from fiancé
thread.title_full: Devastated Kylie Minogue to return engagement ring in effort to 'move on' after shock split from fiancé

author: Halina Watts
title: Devastated Kylie Minogue to return engagement ring in effort to 'move on' after shock split from fiancé
text:
Devastated Kylie Minogue to return engagement ring in effort to 'move on' after shock split from fiancé The 48-year-old Aussie pop star has told pals she feels “completely betrayed” by fiancé Joshua Sasse Share Kylie Minogue and Josh Sasse together last February before their split this week (Photo: Getty Images Europe) Share Get daily updates directly to your inbox + Subscribe Thank you for subscribing! Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email 
Devastated singer Kylie Minogue will return her diamond engagement ring to her dumped fiancé, the Sunday People can reveal. 
The 48-year-old Aussie pop star has told pals she doesn’t want to keep the sparkler given to her by Joshua Sasse because she wants to “move on with her life”. 
Kylie this week announced she has separated from British actor Joshua, 29, after claims he had grown close to Spanish actress Marta Milans, 34. 
Pals say Kylie felt “completely betrayed”. 
A source told the Sunday People : “She started to suspect Joshua over the festive period and they had been arguing since November. Kylie Minogue, wearing the ring, at the Dorchester Hotel in London last year (Photo: MATRIXPICTURES.CO.UK) 
“He was in London and so was Marta. There was a worry that they had met up and he wasn’t being truthful to her. 
“Kylie has ditched her ring. She just wants to move on.” 
But Spanish actress Marta is believed to be devastated at the accusations. 
She spent last weekend being consoled by her close friend Karolina Wydra in New York. 
Posting on Instragram, she wrote: “Thank you for hugging me all weekend Karolina. I don’t know what I would do without you.” Video Loading Click to play Tap to play The video will start in 8 Cancel Play now Kylie Minogue on the red carpet with Joshua Sasse Share this video Watch Next 
Marta is currently holed up with pals in Los Angeles. 
A friend added: “Marta wouldn’t want to get caught up in something like this, she is very upset by the whole thing.” 
Joshua met Marta while making the show No Tomorrow in Vancouver. 
Filming started in August and ended in December. 
A source who worked on it said it was “well known” on set that he and Marta were close. 
But her brother Alfonso said he had “no idea at all” about any liaison. 
Ironically in Marta’s 2010 showreel, the first scene is taken from a short film titled Scandal in which she has been thrust into the limelight after a sex tape leak. 
She can be seen shouting: “Everything thinks I’m a whore.” 
Meanwhile Joshua has been staying at his parents’ house in Herefordshire. He refused to comment yesterday. 
Earlier this week Kylie confirmed the split with an emotive image of a sunrise over calm waters on Instagram. 
She captioned the picture: “We wish only the best for each other as we venture towards new horizons.” 
Joshua met Kylie in summer 2015 on the set of musical ­comedy Galavant. 
After their engagement last February, there were rumours that they had married in secret last summer. 
In October they announced they wouldn’t wed until Australia legalises gay marriage. 
In an ­interview in August, Joshua said: “She is just the most unbelievable bundle of joy. It’s magic, it’s ­excitement and joy and sex.” 
Pals of Kylie, who is planning to make a new album, say she had a “lucky escape” from Joshua. 
Her previous boyfriends ­include Neighbours co-star Jason Donovan, INXS singer Michael Hutchence, fellow rocker Lenny Kravitz, French actor Olivier Martinez and Spanish model Andres Velencoso. 
Just weeks ago, Kylie hinted she had no plans to marry Joshua, saying: “Mum isn’t buying a hat.” 
Later she posted online: “Thank you now for your love and understanding with the news that Josh and I have decided to go our separate ways.” Like us on Facebook
